title: New Bilgerat Rumble Splash Looks Terrible
body:
Who in their right mind thought that this http://img3.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_9192.jpg
Looks better than this? 
https://elohub.com/images/champions/rumble/bilgerat_rumble_skin_large.jpg

replies.body:
League player complains about splash art.

Film at 11.
I want this on CNN, stat.
Last time I checked {{champion:68}} had a flamethrower not a gatling gun....
Yeah, I'm aware. Rumble looks like some old, decrepit yordle.
Its not a "new" splash art, its just the one used in China.
Yes, but the point is they replaced the splash art.

is actually better.... technically speaking at least.
The pallet is better and the splash is more dynamic
If by more dynamic you mean a total mess, then yes. Not to mention the lighting is in total chaos. The previous splash had a soft background so it could accent rumble himself.
Looks better to me. Is this a rumble main thing?
No, I just have the skin and play him every now and then.
